entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
